ingredients: minced lemongrass (from bottom 4 inches of about 3 stalks, tough outer leaves discarded)
hot chili paste (such as sambal oelek)
13.5- to 14-ounce cans unsweetened coconut milk, divided
fish sauce (such as nam pla or nuoc nam)
1/2-inch cubes peeled red-skinned sweet potato (yam; from about 1 large)
dried rice vermicelli noodles or rice stick noodles
skinless boneless chicken thighs, thinly sliced
red Thai bird chiles or 2 red jalapeño chiles, thinly sliced with seeds
